alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alachua and south central Columbia Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near High Springs, or 11 miles southwest of Worthington Spring, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... High Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Western Alachua
